text: Tawhidul Alam Sabuz is a Bangladeshi footballer who plays as a Forward. He currently plays for Bashundhara Kings in Bangladesh Premier League ==International goals== Olympic Team {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
